item.title: FreeNode IRC #indieweb-dev on IIW RWoT and DID's
item.description: What I'm hoping for is that folk in the DID community will consider integrating with IndieAuth. This would enable easy adoption for website owners, and make the logical connection between DID and IndieAuth.

item.title: Git Repos
item.description: A start at exploring IndieWeb Topics

item.title: Resources
item.description: When you post something on the web, it should belong to you, not a corporation. Too many companies have gone out of business and lost all of their users’ data. By joining the IndieWeb, your content stays yours and in your control.
